html.p: i) The x-component of momentum of ball 2. – Graph E: zero before, positive after
ii) The y-component of momentum of ball 1. – Graph E: zero before, positive after.
iii) The y-component of momentum of ball 2. – Graph C: zero before, negative after.
iv) The x-component of momentum of ball 1. – Graph B: large positive before, smaller positive value after collision.
v) The x-component of total momentum. – Graph A, since this is a constant positive number, before and after.
vi) The y-component of total momentum. – None of the graphs, since the y-component of total momentum is zero before and after.
